channel.title: Uniswap on Going the distance
channel.description: Recent content in Uniswap on Going the distance

item.title: Programming Defi: Uniswap. Part 1
item.description: Photo by Piret Ilver on Unsplash Introduction The best way to learn something is to teach others. Second best way to learn something is to do it yourself. I decided to combine the two ways and teach myself and you how to program DeFi services on Ethereum (and any other blockchains based on EVM â€“ Ethereum Virtual Machine). Our main focus will be on how those services work, we’ll try to understand the economical mechanics that make them what they are (and they all based on economical mechanics).
